title: Liverpool's Slow Start Continues
description:
The FC crew discuss Liverpool dropping more points at the start of the season after a 1-1 draw to Crystal Palace which saw Darwin Nunez getting sent off for a headbutt. Plus, Mark Clattenburg joins to discuss all the refereeing controversies surrounding Chelsea and Tottenham's 2-2 draw, while Atletico Madrid and Juventus get off o strong starts on the season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Liverpool drop more points while Darwin Nunez gets sent off; Mark Clattenburg breaks down Chelsea vs Tottenham incidents; Atletico, Juventus' strong starts
